title: LF Coach and Analyst (OOL Team) Tyrant E-sports
body:
Just as the heading suggests, Tyrant E-sports are looking for dedicated individuals to fill the coach and analyst position. 
As our organisation is striving to compete in a competitive environment, any previous experience within the coach/analyst role will be taken into consideration. Financial incentives may be offered based on performance. For more information, you can either leave a comment or message me in client at "Luser". 

We look forward to working with you!
